name: Kart Drift
summary: Kart Drift is an excellent Karts 2D racing game for iOS. The keys to finish 1st…, to know the track, to study the rivals path, anticipate to the curves and control the Drift. You Dare?
storyline: Run and qualify in the top 3 to unlock a new Circuit. Finish 1st in each track to unlock its difficult mode and multiply x2 the reward. Run in reverse mode to multiply x3 the reward. The reverse mode is shown for free in the first race. App in purchase will allow you to enjoy this new driving experience on all tracks. The reward obtained for race consists of coins that you can use to improve the car.
